title: Dengue fever
description: Acute febrile viral illness transmitted by mosquitoes.

title: Type 2 diabetes mellitus
description: Chronic metabolic disorder with persistent hyperglycemia.

title: Essential (primary) hypertension
description: Persistent elevated blood pressure without secondary cause.

title: Asthma
description: Chronic airway inflammatory disease with variable airflow limitation.

title: Depressive episode
description: Mood disorder with persistent low mood and reduced interest.
